title: 4 New Fonts Available
content:
Four new fonts designed by Christopher Sleboda are now available for download. Please visit [http://www.csleboda.com/typography.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018033057/http:/www.csleboda.com/typography.html) for more information.   
   
Also, be sure to check out the rest of the site which was recently updated to include 13 books, 9 collaborations, 10 record covers and more. Point your browser to [http://www.csleboda.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018033057/http:/www.csleboda.com/)
author: csleboda
